--CARD 1

A: Hi. I heard that David is going to travel this summer holiday, is that right?

B: That's right.

A: So Where is he going to travel?

B: He's going to travel to Hawaii. And Who is he going with?

A: He's going with his family. How long is he going to stay?

B: He's going to stay for 5 days and 4 nights. So where is he going to stay?

A: He's going to stay at a luxurious hotel near the beach. What are the local people like?

B: The people are very friendly. And what about the local food?

A: They're fresh and delicious. So What is he going to do?

B: He's going to go sightseeing and sunbathing. How does he feel?

A: He feels very happy.

B: I hopy he will have a wonderful holiday.

A: I think so.

B: Sorry I'm busy now. See you later!

A: Ok bye.

 

 

--Card 2

A: Welcome to Owen Shop. How can I help you?

B: I'm looking for a jacket.

A: Ok. What material do you want?

B: It's made of leather.

A: So what color do you want?

B: Brown, please.

A: And what's your size?

B: It's 40.

A: Here you are.

B: Ok thanks. I want to try it on. Where is the changing room?

A: Here, next to the window.

B: Thanks. Wow how big it is.

A: You are so beautiful/handsome on this jacket.

B: Thanks you. How much is it?

A: It's 70 dollars.

B: Is there any discount?

A: There is 10 percent.

B: How can I pay for you?

A: You can pay in cash.

B: Here you are. Goodbye

A: Thanks you. I hope you will come here again

B: Sure.

 

 

--CARD 3

A: Hi. Did you have any trip last summer?

B: Yes.

A: So where did you go?

B: I went to Sydney.

A: What was the weather like?

B: It was very hot and sunny.

A: How was the temperature?

B: It was 30 degree celsius.

A: What did you do there.

B: I wen sunbathing and surfing.

A: How did you feel?

B: I felt excited. So what about you? Did you have any trip?

A: Yes.

B: Where did you go?

A: I went to Switzerland.

B: What was the weather like?

A: It was cold and snowy.

B: How was the temperature?

A: It was down to 0 degree celsius.

B: Oh. What did you do there?

A: I went skiing and sightseeing.

B: How did you feel?

A: I felt very tired.

B: Do you have any question for me?

A: No. Do you want to have a trip to Paris with next weekend?

B: That's great.

A: Ok see you later.

B: Bye.

 

--Card 4

A: Excuse me. I want to rent your apartment. Can you give me some information?

B: Yes.

A: What is the address?

B: It's at number 709, Song Da building, 135 Cau Giay street.

A: How big is it?

B: Quite big. It's 60 square meters.

A: How many room are there?

B: There are 5 rooms. A living room, 2 bedrooms, a kitchen and a toilet. What furniture do you want in the bedroom?

A: I want double bed and wardrobe. How far is it from your apartment to the city centre?

B: Quite far. It's 6 kilometers.

A: How far is it from your apartment to the nearest bus stop?

B: It's just 5 minute to walk. How much can you pay for a month?

A: I can pay from 10 milllion VND to 15 million VND per month.

B: How many tenant are there?

A: There are 3 people.

B: How long do you want to stay?

A: At least a year, from September.

B: When can I meet you?

A: 10 am, Monday or Friday.

B: Ok see you soon on Friday.

A: Thank you, sir. Bye.

 

--Card 5

A: Hi. Do you know we have a newcomer.

B: Yes I know.

A: So what is her or his name?

B: She is Jennifer Lawrence. Where does she come from?

A: She comes from Kentucky - the USA. How old is she?

B: Same with us. She's 19 years old. What is she like?

A: She's quite thin but so beasutiful. What does she like?

B: She likes playing badminton, reading books and listening to pop music. What is she look like?

A: She's generous, friendly and funny. How many people are there in her family.

B: I don't know exactly but she has an older brother and a younger sister. Do you know her phone number?

A: It's 098713456.

B: Thanks. I hope she will be your best friend.

A: I think so.

B: Sorry I'm busy now. See you later.

A: Ok bye.

 

 

--Card 6

A: Hi. Don't forget we are going to take part in a food festival.

B: Ok I remember it. But where is it going to take place?

A: It's going to take place in Daewoo Hotel. What time and date is it going to start?

B: It's going to start from 8am to 4pm on Sunday, the second of August. How many dishes are there?

A: It's more than 30 dishes. Where does the dishes come from?

B: They comes from Korea. What are you going to do there?

A: I'm going to cook, learn how to cook, sell and buy food. What is the quality of food?

B: It's so delicious. What is the aim of festival?

A: It's going to show different dishes and how foods are cooked. What much is the ticket?

B: It's 160.000 VND for a person and 100.000 VND for a student.

A: Ok see you soon in Daewoo Hotel.

B: Ok bye

 

--Card 7

A: Hi. I heard that you want to take part in a course in E4U. Shall we share some information?

B: Yes, of course.

A: How many course does it have?

B: It has 4 course. Grammar, procunciation, speaking and TOEIC. What time and date is it start?

A: It starts from 6.30 to 8pm on monday, wednesday and friday or tuesday, thursday and sunday. Who are the teachers?

B: They are english and vietnamese teachers. Who are the learners.

A: They are students from HaUI. What activities does it have?

B: It has funny games and outdoor activities. How much does it cost?

A: It's from 600.000VND to 1.200.000 VND for a course. What is the phone number?

B: It's 043768686. What is the address?

A: It's on the third floors, A2 building.

B: OK. Sorry I'm busy now, see you later.

A; Ok bye.

 

 

--Card 8

A: Hi. Do you know our classmates had a trip to Thu Le zoo? I want to have a trip like that.

B: So do I. And what time did they start to go?

A: They started to go at 7 am. Where did they start to go?

B: They started to go in the gate of HaUI. How did they go?

A: They went by coach. Who were the attendees?

B: They were our classmates and head teacher. What did they do there?

A: They went sightseeing to see animals such as lions, tigers, monkeys, elephants and peacocks. They went boating and fed the animals. How much is the ticket?

B: It's 5.000VND for a child and 10.000VND for a adult. What time did they return?

A: They returned at 5h30pm. Where is the zoo?

B: It's in Thu Le, Ba Dinh district, Hanoi city.

A: Do you want to have a trip with to there?

B: That's great.

A: Ok bye see you later.

B: Ok goodbye.

 

--Card 9

A: Hi. Remember that we are going to join a Collenge Sports Day.

B: Ok but where is it going to take place?

A: It's going to take place at HaUI statdium. What time is it going to start?

B: It's going to start at 7 am. How are we going to go?

A: We are going by bus, taxi or motorbike. What kind of sports does it have?

B: It has football, volleyball, badminton, tennis and running. Who are the participants?

A: They are students at HaUI and students from the other universities. How much is the ticket?

B: Free for student from HaUI but It's 20.000 VND for a student from the other universities. What time is it going to close?

A: It's going to close at 5pm. What thing do you want to bring?

B: I'm going to bring T-shirts, shorts and trainers. Sorry I'm busy now, see you later.

A: Ok bye.

 

--Card 10

A: Hi. I heard that you have just had a part-time job, is that right?

B: Yes.

A: What do you do?

B: I'm working as a waiter in a restaurant.

A: What time do you work a day?

B: from 9am to 3pm.

A: What day do you work?

B: from monday to friday.

A: How much do you earn a hour?

B: I earn 4 dollars per hour.

A: What's your uniform?

B: It's white shirt and blue jeans. And what about you? Do you have any part-time job?

A: Yes.

B: What do you do?

A: I'm a receptionist in a hotel.

B: What time do you work a day?

A: from 3pm to 10pm;

B: What day do you work?

A: from monday to sunday.

B: How much do you earn a hour?

A: I earn 10 dollars per hour.

B: What's your uniform?

A: It's white shirt and black trousers.
